title: About
text:
I am an Engineer turned Data Analyst. I believe that technical rigor without curiosity is just calculation, not insight.

The â€œPlot Twistâ€ (My Background)
I didnâ€™t start in a computer science lab; I started in the labs of ESIQIE - IPN, graduating as a Petroleum Chemical Engineer.
There, I forged a steel-trap mind for Mathematics (Calculus, Linear Algebra, Probability) and Process Optimization. My first lines of code werenâ€™t in Python, but in Fortran and Matlab, solving thermodynamic equations.
This background gave me a unique perspective: I see data analysis not just as â€œcoding,â€ but as optimizing a system. I transitioned to Data Science because I realized the same logic used to refine chemical processes could be used to refine business decisions.


My Superpower: The Researcherâ€™s Mindset
I pride myself on being a lifelong learner. While my core strength is mathematical logic, my â€œsuperpowerâ€ is my research capability.
I donâ€™t just rely on what I already know; I possess the discipline to study, read, and master new tools on the fly. Whether itâ€™s deep-diving into a new R library or understanding a complex business requirement, I have the grit to find the answer and the technical foundation to implement it correctly.


Beyond the Data
When I step away from the screen, I blend my analytical side with leadership and creativity:

ğŸ€ Leadership: As a former basketball team captain for â€œClub Deportivo Leones,â€ I learned that strategy is useless without team execution.
ğŸ¥ Creative Tech: I explore the intersection of technology and art. I am a hobbyist photographer, and I actively experiment with AI Media Generation to support audiovisual projects.
ğŸ¬ Cinema & Storytelling: I am a huge fan of music and streaming series. This isnâ€™t just entertainment; it fuels my appreciation for narrative structure.



Letâ€™s Connect
I am based in Mexico City and always open to discussing data strategy, optimization challenges, or just sharing a good series recommendation.
Feel free to reach out via LinkedIn or Email.
